stories.text: After 10 years of web dev, I am a bit jaded with it. Want to do anything except web dev. Those who have made this switch what did you learn / end up in?
stories.title: Ask HN: Those who changed industries from web dev, where did you go?
Bike Math. Happy Saturday Night HN

stories.text: I recently signed up for a lifetime plan with PCloud EU. I used their integrated speed test because the speed is erratic and unusable at its worst. PCloud support directed me to my ISP but they havenâ€™t been helpful beyond asking me to reset my equipment. The connection is just as slow on my fast work connection with a different ISP. Speedtest.net to other servers in the same country (Luxembourg) are fine from both home and work connections. Is there something like traceroute that can measure the speed (Mbps) for each hop, or a better way to see where the bottleneck is?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to find the network bottleneck to my cloud storage provider?
